text: "Burger Kings" is the eighteenth episode of the thirty-second season of The Simpsons. It first aired on April 11, 2021. In this episode, Mr. Burns creates a fast-food company that serves plant-based burgers with Homer as its spokesman while Marge buys its stock. The episode received positive reviews. == Other websites == * Category:2021 television episodes Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:The Simpsons (season 32) episodes
title: Burger Kings
